ggtrace 0.0.0.9000

Create geom_*_trace layers

create_trace_layers.Rd

Create geom_*_trace layers

create_trace_layers(
  mapping,
  data,
  stat,
  geom,
  position,
  show.legend,
  inherit.aes,
  params,
  trace_position,
  background_color,
  allow_bottom = TRUE
)

Arguments

mapping

Set of aesthetic mappings created by aes() to use for generating layers.
data

The data to be displayed in these layers.
stat

Statistical transformation to use for these layers.
geom

The geometric object to use to display the data.
position

Position adjustment.
show.legend

Should these layers be included in the legend?
inherit.aes

If FALSE, overrides the default aesthetics.
params

Additional parameters to pass to the geom and stat.
trace_position

Specifies which groups of data points should be outlined. Can be 'all', 'bottom', or a predicate to use for filtering data. If 'all', the default, every group plotted will be outlined, if 'bottom', only the bottom most layer of points will be outlined. A subset of data points can be outlined by passing a predicate. This must evaluate to `TRUE` or `FALSE` within the context of the input data.
background_color

Color to use for background points when a predicate is passed to `trace_position`. If NULL, the original fill color will be used.
allow_bottom

Should 'bottom' be allowed as an argument for trace_position?
